definition: abbr. for Xiamen or Amoy 廈門|厦门[Xia4 men2], Fujian

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Prof Deng obtained his MA and PhD degrees in Accounting from Xiamen University.
sentences.chinese: 邓教授先后于厦门大学会计系获得其硕士及博士学位。

sentences.english: The Proceedings of ICCSE 2008(with CD) have been published by Xiamen University Press officially.
sentences.chinese: 论文集与论文CD已经交由厦门大学出版社正式出版。

sentences.english: Xiamen Island, where Xiamen University is located, is known as "a Garden on the Sea".
sentences.chinese: 厦门大学所在的厦门岛素有“海上花园”之称。

sentences.english: This paper introduces two models for interpreter training: Daniel Gile' s Model and the Xiamen University Mod- el.
sentences.chinese: 本文通过对吉尔口译训练模式与厦门大学。

sentences.english: Was appointed literature chief 1926 to Xiamen University.
Xiamen University is considered as the most beautiful and romantic campus in China.
sentences.chinese: 厦门大学被看做是中国最美丽和浪漫的校园。

sentences.english: On the first day, we visited to Xiamen University and Nanputuo Temple.
sentences.chinese: 第一天，我们参观了厦门大学和南普陀寺。

sentences.english: The nice seventh of Xiamen University academy is in Hubei admitting the former years the fraction is many?
sentences.chinese: 厦门大学嘉庚学院在湖北往年的录取分数是多少？

sentences.english: Which Singaporean was once the president of Xiamen University (University of Amoy)?
sentences.chinese: 哪一位新加坡人在厦门大学当过校长？

definition: Sun Yat-sen University (Guangzhou)/Sun Yat-sen University (Kaohsiung)/Sun Yat-sen University (Moscow), founded in 1925 as training ground for Chinese communists
Suzhou or Soochow University (Suzhou, PRC since 1986)
Jinan University in Guangdong Province, with 4 campuses in Guangzhou, Shenzhen and Zhuhai

pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Zhong1 wen2 Da4 xue2

definition: National Taiwan University/abbr. to 臺大|台大[Tai2 Da4]
